alert.note: Alert for Iowa; Lafayette (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 03 at 11:57AM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Lafayette and southern Iowa Counties through 100 PM CDT... At 1156 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Belmont, or 7 miles northeast of Platteville, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Dodgeville, Mineral Point, Darlington, Belmont, Blanchardville, Barneveld, Ridgeway, Linden, Waldwick, Cobb, Fayette, Rewey, Hollandale, Platte Mounds, Calamine, Governor Dodge St Park, Edmund, Yellowstone Lake St Park, London and Jonesdale. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
